TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NodeStartDescription extends System.Fabric.Description.NodeTransitionDescription
Public NotInheritable Class NodeStartDescription Inherits NodeTransitionDescription

Docs.summary: Describes information about how a node should be started using StartNodeTransitionAsync().

MemberSignature.Value: public NodeStartDescription (Guid operationId, string nodeName, System.Numerics.BigInteger nodeInstanceId);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Guid operationId, string nodeName, valuetype System.Numerics.BigInteger nodeInstanceId) cil managed
Public Sub New (operationId As Guid, nodeName As String, nodeInstanceId As BigInteger)

Docs.param: A Guid to identify this operation. This should be unique, and should not be used with other operations.
The name of the node to start or stop. The name can be determined through GetNodeListAsync().
The node instance id of the target node. This can be determined through GetNodeListAsync().
Docs.summary: Create an instance of NodeStartDescription, which describes information about how a node should be started using StartNodeTransitionAsync().
